title: paoigy771
author: paoigy771
content: Good afternoon! This morning, for the first time, I created an account on your site, made a deposit, made one bet on basketball. The bet won, I decided to withdraw part of the funds in the amount of $100. In the evening, I went back to the site and saw a window with verification. Immediately after that, I immediately uploaded the required documents and shook my head.After that, I decided to withdraw another part of the winnings, but this action was blocked (error information was displayed). Then I contacted the support service on the site, where they told me that my account was not the only one and after that they stopped answering me. However, I do not understand what it means that my account is not the only one. Perhaps I was confused with my own brother, who advised me your site. He and I have the same last name.

comments.author: ScamViruS
comments.body: You have not clearly stated any information why your account is blocked. I think the reason for blocking your account is multi account. You can post evidence here of conversations with the support team. Because it is difficult to say anything without evidence. This post of yours doesn't prove anything, unless you post with all the evidence. And if you have violated their TOC by creating multiple accounts, they will also respond to that.

comments.author: paoigy771
comments.body: I can't get into my account, they don't answer me in the chat on the site, saying that this issue is closed. My login is specified on the site paoigy771. I assure you that this is my first account in this casino and there is no question of a multi-account

comments.author: khaled0111
comments.body: Quote from: ScamViruS on December 04, 2022, 07:47:41 PMI think the reason for blocking your account is multi account.Yes, that's the reason why they banned his account according to the customer support reply.However, in their FAQ they say that alt accounts are allowed, unless it's used to cheat or abuse their bonuses:Quote from: https://rollbit.com/faqAre "alt" accounts allowed?As long as you have not created another account for nefarious purposes, that's fine.We reserve the right to disable accounts that have been created with the intention to abuse our bonus, coupon and chat features.This is the account of their official representative: RollbitcomSend him a PM or post on their announcement thread to get their attention.

comments.author: paoigy771
comments.body: I want to see evidence of a multi-account. If I first registered on their site and passed verification. I don't have another account. My brother with the same last name is registered on this site, maybe this is the problem.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Quote from: paoigy771 on December 04, 2022, 08:33:31 PMMy brother with the same last name is registered on this site, maybe this is the problem.Probably, that's the case, since high possibility that you will be using the same ip address on the same network connection. Since you already gave them personal information about you, i guess you should open a support ticket again and pm their support here with the linked shared above. Tell them about this, make a pic both of you and your brother with your phone logged in on casino account. Tell them you both using the site and sharing the same wifi connection.Well, i don't know if it will work, but there's no harm in trying especially for the $100 you owned.

comments.author: Rollbit Razer
comments.body: OP is a prolific sportsbook abuser, creating new accounts to circumvent limits.OP attempts to mislead the forum by suggesting it's their first account on our platform.We've invested significant resources into identifying and thwarting this type of abuse and have zero tolerance for it.They have tens of accounts at this point and are very well aware that they're prohibited from using our platform.If OP continues to open accounts on our platform, they will receive the same action. Rollbit and our sportsbook provider do not tolerate this behaviour.

comments.author: paoigy771
comments.body: Provide proof of multiple accounts in my name. So you can say about any user who did not please you with something

comments.author: paoigy771
comments.body: I can say with confidence that I have only one account in your casino. What you say is false and false. One gets the impression that you are fraudulently enriched by ordinary users. Since you do not provide any evidence to the contrary.If this is not the case, return me at least the amount of my balance and terminate the contract with me.Otherwise, I will leave negative reviews about you on all possible platforms so that people know that your casino is a scam.

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Quote from: paoigy771 on December 05, 2022, 06:42:11 AMProvide proof of multiple accounts in my name. So you can say about any user who did not please you with somethingLikewise, you haven't provided any evidence of their wrongdoing. I'm not taking the casino's side in this case, but your accusation is just as baseless if you don't back it up with evidence. At least show us proof of the deposit, and a screenshot of your communication with customer support and their response.

comments.author: paoigy771
comments.body: The problem is that I can't get into my account to show you the credit history. https://sun9-3.userapi.com/impg/htAjiFFmU-mNKnaeOQjGFYWwFrFmMPnVdn3GAA/96bKGRXCSlM.jpg?size=808x551&quality=96&sign=563adfc0737536450a12bea4c87bbf4f&type=album

comments.author: paoigy771
comments.body: I'm trying to contact support but they don't provide any proof and block messages from being sent.https://sun9-38.userapi.com/impg/QcJh_NzclMEDQsqRVXdJmX7j5s43qiWlwsZ73Q/U3D4iR32Drk.jpg?size=381x589&quality=96&sign=717841c7167672ce6f7c6e72a8460e19&type=album

comments.author: Dave1
comments.body: I don't know I just suspect that maybe the casino found out that you might be doing some arbitrage betting, with you and your brothers account?That's only my suspect in this case.Go follow what @khaled0111 has advised, contact them directly and see how it goes for you.

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Quote from: paoigy771 on December 05, 2022, 01:45:31 PMThe problem is that I can't get into my account to show you the credit history. You can still show other evidence if you want, for example blockchain transactions of your deposits and withdrawals from the platform and a response from their customer support explaining the reasons why your account was blocked. I'm not saying that this will help in your case, however, it's important to make sure that you have evidence to back up your claim.
